kpi.name: M1002C604

kpi_info.title: E-DCH SETUP FAILURE DUE TO BTS FOR STREAMING
kpi_info.use: The number of E-DCH setup failures due to BTS for streaming class connections. UPDATED: When the RNC receives an NBAP: RADIO LINK RECONFIGURATION FAILURE or an NBAP: RADIO LINK SETUP FAILURE message during the E-DCH setup, or when a timer waiting for the acknowledgement message expires.

kpi.kpi_alias: E-DCH SETUP FAILURE DUE TO BTS FOR STREAMING
